content: I don't have the up-to-date data on the current popularity of tea in asia, as it can vary depending on the region and country. however, historically speaking, some of the most popular teas in asia have been green tea in japan and china, black tea in india and sri lanka, oolong tea in taiwan, and matcha tea in japan. however, each country has its own tea culture with its unique customs and rituals surrounding the brewing and consumption of tea.
